heading: can i get a witness?
subheading: congressional prosecutors said thursday that president clinton repeatedly put himself above the law and betrayed his oath of office in trying to hide his affair with monica lewinsky. during the first day of the impeachment trial, the house managers urged the senate to call half a dozen witnesses. democrats and the white house do not want witnesses called, saying there is already a mountain of evidence on record. white house lawyers will present their defense case beginning tuesday, the same day the president is scheduled to deliver the state of the union address.
author: wired staff
text: congressional prosecutors said thursday that president clinton repeatedly put himself above the law and betrayed his oath of office in trying to hide his affair with monica lewinsky. during the first day of the impeachment trial, the house managers urged the senate to call half a dozen witnesses. democrats and the white house do not want witnesses called, saying there is already a mountain of evidence on record. white house lawyers will present their defense case beginning tuesday, the same day the president is scheduled to deliver the state of the union address.
